p: The study of 68 samples of edible mushrooms showed high variability in the content of the analyzed components in the studied mushroom species. The moisture content of the analyzed samples ranged from 82%–95% ( Table 1). The highest moisture content was found in Suillus grevillei (92.4%–95.7%) and the lowest in Macrolepiota procera (82.0%–87.1%) and Suillus bovinus (82.9%–85.7%). These values are in accordance with other studies [ 40, 41, 42].
